titleStmt.title: The advancement of Christs interests the governing end of a Christians life a second sermon preached before the Right Honourable Sir John Shorter, Knight, Lord Mayor of the city of London at Grocers-Hall, January the 9th, 1687/8 / by Daniel Williams.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Daniel, 1643?-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Robinson ... and Tho. Cockerill ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A sermon preached before the Lord Mayor.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
